text: Django Unchained is a 2012 American western movie directed by Quentin Tarantino. It is set in 1858. It stars Jamie Foxx as Django, Christoph Waltz as Dr. King Schultz, and Leonardo DiCaprio as Calvin Candie. This comedy-drama is about the Antebellum South. There has been controversy related to its subject matter. Django Unchained was released on Christmas 2012 in the United States. == Other websites == * Category:2012 drama movies Category:2010s Western (genre) movies Category:American drama movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about slavery Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies directed by Quentin Tarantino Category:Movies composed by Ennio Morricone Category:Movies set in Mississippi Category:Movies featuring a Best Supporting Actor Academy Award- winning performance
title: Django Unchained
